anya-e0806n4:2_0: Nanu ca ‘ṇo vāpacce’ti vacanato kathaṁ pakativisayāvagamo siyā.
anya-e0806n4:2_1: Yathākathañci pakativisayāvagamepi sāmaññavacanato pana dhammenāpaccantyādo yato kutoci dhammeniccāditopi
anya-e0806n4:2_4: apaccavatāti ‘‘ṇo vāpacce’’ti vasiṭṭhādyatthasseva pariggahaṇāya sāmaññavacanato yo apaccavā tato,
anya-e0806n4:2_5: atthato pana asambhavā dabbācakasaddāva sāmatthiyena chaṭṭhiyantā sabbaliṅgavacanā jāyateti viññātabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:3_5: dhammenāpaccaṁ kassāti pucchitvā devadattassāti apekkhiyamānaṁ vadati.
anya-e0806n4:3_8: Na hettha ṇādivutti aññattha nahetakāmantattha (potthake) sāpekkhattā kambalo vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṁ devadattassāti
anya-e0806n4:3_9: ettha pana vasiṭṭho-paccavāti tato chaṭṭhiyantā hoticcāsaṅkiyāha- ‘na ce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:4_1: Na hettha sambandho vasiṭṭhassa kambalāpekkhattena apaccassa ca devadattāpekkhattenātthantarāpekkhāya
anya-e0806n4:4_2: vasiṭṭhassāpaccena sambandhābhāvāyeva vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṁ vāsiṭṭhoti ṇādivuttiyā bhāve sāmatthiyaṁ natthi,
anya-e0806n4:4_3: samatthañhi vasiṭṭhaṁ rājapurisādi samāsavuttiyamekatthattamiva vāsiṭṭhādiṇādivuttiyaṁ ṇādippaccayamupajanayati,
anya-e0806n4:5_1: tadā visesato yassāpaccena sambandho tatova janakato so siyāti dassetumāha- ‘yajjeva’miccādi.
anya-e0806n4:6_0: Yo janakoti yoyo yassa yassa apaccassa janako.
anya-e0806n4:6_2: Siyāti tasmiṁ tasmiṁ apaccatthe ṇādippaccayo siyā.
anya-e0806n4:6_5: na mūlappakatitoti paramappakatito na hotīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n4:7_1: sambandhābhāvā (tādisavacanābhāvā) ca mūlappakatito ṇādippaccayassābhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni mūlappakatitovāssābhimatabhāvaṁ
anya-e0806n4:8_0: Kathampanidaṁ viññāyaticcādinā janakassevābyāhitassāpaccena mukhya sambandhamānīya idamayuttantyādinā
anya-e0806n4:8_2: evaṁ hiccādi kathaṁpanidamiccādinā yathāvuttassa samattha navākyaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:8_3: hiyasmā taṁ disvā tathā pucchito devadattassavātiādinā uppādetārameva niddisati,
anya-e0806n4:8_5: tasmā uppādetāyevāpaccena sambajjhati na pitāmahoti yojetvā adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0806n4:8_7: tena apaccena saddhiṁ uppādetuyeva janakasseva yogo sambandho paṭipādetuṁ na sakkāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:9_3: soti yoso yassātyaniyamaniddiṭṭho so ñātuṁ na icchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:9_4: Iminā idaṁ dīpeti- ‘‘napatatyanena naraketyapaccanti vuccati apaccenānena yassakassaci avisesenāpatanambhavati
anya-e0806n4:9_5: narake soso tāya pucchāya ñātuṁ na icchito’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:9_6: So vāti kassāyaṁ puttoti pucchāyānurodhane so uppādetāyeva ñātumicchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:9_12: yassa taṁ taṁnimittaṁ tasmā katvā (potthake) evaṁ diṭṭhiko hiccādinā yathāvuttaṁ samattheti.
anya-e0806n4:10_3: Kasmā evaṁ diṭṭhikoti āha ‘yaṁ nimittaṁ hi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:10_7: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘‘tena byavahitajanitenāpi pumunā pubbajopi narakaṁ na patati so pubbajassāpya paccaṁ bhavati yathāvuttena nibbacanenā’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:10_10: Pubba pubbabhāve satīti pubbassa pubbassa vijjamānatte sati.
anya-e0806n4:10_11: Byavahitena janite apaccepi nimittaṁ apāyāpatakāraṇabhāvo atthiye vāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:10_14: Abhedopacārenāti pubbapubbabhāve saticcādinā vuttanayena janakassa viya pārampariyenapubbesampinimittatā
anya-e0806n4:10_15: vato janakasadisattā janakāva nāma te siyunti evamabhedena upacaraṇato cintanatoti attho.
anya-e0806n4:10_17: evamubhayathāpi mūlappakatiyā paccenābhisambandhā kathamanantara manantarādi (potthake) (tattha) potthake
anya-e0806n4:12_0: Evammūlakatito- paccasāmaññena ṇādippaccayaṁ vavatthapetvā idāni apaccāditopi hoteva ṇādi sāmaññavidhānā.
anya-e0806n4:12_1: So ca bahulādhikārato gurujanāyattattā tanniyogācaraṇena pasatthe yevāpacce byavahitajanitepi itthivajjite siyāti dassetumāha ‘nattādīhi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:12_2: Satiyeva gurujane sappadhānabhāvena kucchite-paccetu nattādīvuttīhi vasiṭṭhādīhi ṇādippaccayo hoti vāsiṭṭhotiādi,
anya-e0806n4:13_1: Apacce vidhīyamāno paccayo apaccavatā jāyamāno tassāpaccanti atthe jāyati.
anya-e0806n4:13_2: Socāya matthaviseso cha(ṭṭhiyanta) tābhāve kathaṁ siyāti idamettha sāmatthiyaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:13_3: Anantare vāpacce putte-bhidheyya nattādo vāpacce-bhidheyyāti sasambandho.
anya-e0806n4:13_6: Apacceti ekavacanena niddese pumunā napuṁsakena kariyati,
anya-e0806n4:13_13: Tassa vacanicchābhāvatoti tassa liṅgavacanassa sutte vattumicchāyābhāvatoti attho.
anya-e0806n4:14_0: Kiṁ pana kāraṇaṁ sutte liṅgavacanāvacanicchāyaṁ tassāppadhānattā yenakenaci liṅgādinā niddeso-vassaṁ kattabboti nānantariyakattā tassehopādānaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:14_6: Kāriyappaṭipattiyāti pume napuṁsakepacce-bhidheyye vidhi hoticcevaṁ kāriyappaṭipattiyā vattuṁ na iṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:16_0: Satipanāti vākāre sati tu aniccattā ṇappaccayassa.
anya-e0806n4:16_4: Pakkhe vākyasamāsāpi siyunti pakkhe samāsavuttiyā eva bādhitattā pakkhantare ṇādivutti na bādhīyatīti vākyavuttiyopi siyunti attho.
anya-e0806n4:18_0: Vacchakaccādinā kaccādigaṇaṁ dassetvā tassa vibhāgena nipphattiṁ dassetuṁ ‘vacchādīhī’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n4:18_2: Tattha kaṇhasaddo brāhmaṇe vattamāno ṇānaṇāya nappaccaye uppādayatīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:18_7: tesu pāṭhāti taṁsuttappadese ‘‘katā ṇiyove’’ti pāṭhābhāvepi diccā dīnamākatigaṇattā paṭhitameva nāma tanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:19_3: Soyeva gāvaṁ sajāti sādhāraṇaṁ vijātivinivattanaṁ sakaṭādivacanaṁ tāyatīti gottanti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:19_8: Vacchādayo nattādino apaccassa apaccaṁ tadapaccādi cāti dassetumāha-‘nattādino’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:21_2: atthi paṇhiādayo keciyeva kattikādīsu antogadhā hontīti vattumāha- ‘etthā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:23_3: Tasmā tasmiṁ gaggādikepi parasatthapaṭhite yoyo payogo āgame dissati vaccho aggivessoccādi.
anya-e0806n4:23_6: Gottassa gaggavaṁsassa ādibhūtena gaggena upalakkhito gaṇo gottādigaṇo,
anya-e0806n4:25_1: Āti nāmavisesanesati ‘‘vidhibbisesanantassā’’ti tadanta vidhinā akāranto gayhatīti āha-‘visesanena cā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:29_2: Jātisaddāeteti idaṁ manusso mānusoti ettha apaccatthābhāve hetuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:29_3: Apaccattho ettha natthevāti ca idaṁ visuṁ manussamānusa saṅkhātassa paccatthassābhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:29_4: Ṇovāti manuno apaccanti atthe‘‘ṇo vāpacce’’ti (4-1) ṇappaccayova.
anya-e0806n4:31_2: pañcālānaṁ janapadānaṁ rājāti vā evamettha vi(bhāgo) veditabbo okkākānaṁ apaccaṁ rājā vā okkāko.
anya-e0806n4:33_6: Iha tu tatiye-tthe vattamāno gayhatīti vuttaṁ- ‘vaṇṇantaramāpādita’nti. Rāgāti.
anya-e0806n4:34_6: tena sutte rāgāti vuttepi tabbācakā kasāvasaddāti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n4:34_7: rāgāti pana tenāti rāgasseva niddiṭṭhepi tabbhāvenā tabbāvakabhāvenā-ti bhavitabbaṁ ttho niddiṭṭho,
anya-e0806n4:34_8: tabbācakā ca honto‘tena ratta’nti atthe hotīti kasāvena rattanti viññāyatīti rāgavācino tatiyantattaṁ sampajjati,
anya-e0806n4:34_9: tena ‘ṇa rāgā tena ratta’nti vuttepi labbhamānatthavasena vuttaṁ- ‘rāgavācitatiyantato’ti.
anya-e0806n4:34_10: Sutte pana rāgena rattantetasmiṁ atthe rāgā rāgavācīsaddā tatiyantā ṇappaccayo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:36_1: Sutte ayamattho ‘‘induyuttena nakkhattena lakkhito ce kālo,
anya-e0806n4:36_2: tadā tena lakkhite kāletyasmiṁ atthe tatiyantato nakkhattā ṇo hotī’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:36_5: kāleti pana atthaniddesato ṇappaccayādheyyassa kālo ādhāroti viññāyatīti ‘lakkhite kāle’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:36_6: visessagatavibhattiyā vicāritāya visesana gatā ca (vicāritā) nāmāti āha- ‘nakkhattene’ticcādi,
anya-e0806n4:36_9: Tasso bhayassapi kālassa candayuttena phussādinā lakkhiyabhāvā lakkhaṇe tatiyā yuttanti vattumāha- ‘kiriyā rūpo kālo’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:37_6: Kattikāya lakkhito muhuttoti ettha candaṁ vinā kattikāya tu kevalāya muhutto kālo lakkhito ‘kattikā muhutto’ti.
anya-e0806n4:37_7: Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhīti ettha phusseninduyuttena atthasiddhi lakkhitā na kālo phussoti.
anya-e0806n4:37_8: Nakkhattayuttassa kālassa ratyādivisesāparāmāsena nakkhattavācito uppannassa paccayassa suttantarena
anya-e0806n4:37_9: lopaṁ vidhāya puna aññena suttena yuttāti desavidhānena sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttehi-ṭṭhamabhidhānaṁ parehi,
anya-e0806n4:38_0: Ratyādivisesāparāmāsenāti phussī ratti phusso ahoti evaṁ ratyādivisesassa aparāmāsena asammassena aggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n4:38_1: Sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttenāti phussakattikādīnaṁ yaṁyaṁ liṅgaṁ yāyā saṅkhyā,
anya-e0806n4:38_2: attaniyehi tehi tehi liṅgehi tāhitāhi ca saṅkhyāhi yuttena nakkhattasaddena.
anya-e0806n4:38_3: Na tadupalakkhito kāloti kattikā saddobahuvacananto bahutārakattā kattikāya,
anya-e0806n4:39_0: Sattamī siyāti nakkhattasaddā taddhitalopantā phussena pāyasaṁ bhuñjeyya,
anya-e0806n4:39_1: phusse pāyasaṁ bhuñjeyyā’tyādo ādheyyantarāpekkhā siyā sattamī,
anya-e0806n4:39_9: tañca na vinādheyyena hotītyādheyyantarāpekkhāyaṁ tesu sattamīyeva siyā,
anya-e0806n4:39_11: Attanodāni dassane sattamiyā appasaṅgaṁ paṭhamāyevopapattiṁ dassetumāha- ‘cande panūpacārene’ccādi,
anya-e0806n4:39_13: Evañcarahi vacanamantarena paresaṁ viya sattamīvidhāyakaṁ kathaṁ kattikāya jātoccāsaṅkiya tampaṭipādetumāha- ‘kattikāya jāto’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:39_16: Lopenāti kattikāhi induyuttāhi lakkhito kāloti viggayha kataṇappaccayassa lopena.
anya-e0806n4:41_4: Yāgasampadānampi loke devatāti pasiddhanti yāgassa yajitabbassa puroḍāsādino sampadānampi paṭiggāhako
anya-e0806n4:41_5: pindādi loke deyyassa puroḍāsādino devatā sāmīti pasiddhantyattho,
anya-e0806n4:42_0: Mantathomanīyampi devatāti pasiddhanti yena manthena yo thūyate so tassa mantassa devatā sāmīti loke
anya-e0806n4:42_1: pasiddhantyattho mahindo yamo varuṇo devatā assāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:42_5: Pāṇinīyā ‘‘sāsmiṁ puṇṇamāsīti saññāya’’nti (4-2-21) suttayitvā phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṁ phusso māso phusso
anya-e0806n4:42_7: tena tesaṁ phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṁ pañcadasaratteti ettha ca bhatakamāse ca taddhito na bhavati.
anya-e0806n4:42_8: Idha pana ‘saññāya’nti vacanābhāve bhatakamāsepi chaṭṭhyatthe bhavatītyāsaṅka viracayati ‘bhatakamāsepi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:42_9: Puṇṇo mā iccatra māsaddo candapariyāyoti āha- ‘māsaddene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:42_10: Puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanāti ettha puṇṇamāsīsaddassa puṇṇo mā assanti nīharitvā vacanāti attho.
anya-e0806n4:42_11: Vuttiyā atthassa phuṭīkaraṇāya vuttaṁ- ‘so puṇṇo tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:42_14: bhatakassa bhatiyā kammakārakassa yo tiṁsati ratto māso paribbayaniyamito,
anya-e0806n4:43_4: Assāti sāmaññavacanepi ‘sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī’ti sutte assāti avisesavacanepi soyeva puṇṇamāsīsadde
anya-e0806n4:44_1: Atha addhamāsasaṁvaccharānampi udāharaṇatte nopaññāso kasmā na katoccāha- ‘addhamāsasaṁvaccharāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n4:44_2: Evammaññate ‘‘addhamāsasaṁvaccharānaṁ na paccayenojukamabhidhānamapi tu saṁvaccharepi phussādimāsasambhavāsmiṁ
anya-e0806n4:44_4: yathā ca phussādimāsassa sambandhī addhamāso phusso addhamāsotyupacārīyate ,
anya-e0806n4:46_3: kociyeva hotīti hontīti ito bhinditvā ānetabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:46_4: Tadā desassāti iminā ‘‘tadādesā taggahaṇena gayhantī’’ti paribhāsamupalakkheti.
anya-e0806n4:46_5: Katayādesassāpīti kato yādeso yassa tassa katayādesassāpīti.
anya-e0806n4:46_8: Tasadde nekenāpi paccekābhisambandhe siddheti evamaññate- ‘‘yathā’tena kataṁkīta’ (4-29) ntyādisutte ekova tasaddo bahūhi paccayattehi sambajjhate,
anya-e0806n4:46_12: tattha paṭhamaṁ dassento jānaniccādinādhippāyamāvīkatvā dvitaggahaṇamiccādinā padatthamāha.
anya-e0806n4:47_0: Tattha-‘yo yamadhīte jānāti cā’ti iminā dvitaggahaṇābhāve paccayatthāvayavassa samuccayappasaṅgamāha.
anya-e0806n4:47_4: na (jānāti) tattha na siyāti bodhayituṁ byabhicāramāha‘na paccekāti sambandhene’ti.
anya-e0806n4:47_5: Yathā ‘‘tena kathaṁ kīta’’miccādo ‘‘tena jitaṁ jayati’’ccādi paccekasambandhena bhavati evammāviññāyīti yatheccādi kassāttho.
anya-e0806n4:47_6: ‘Tena kataṁ kīta’’miccādīhi avatvā ‘‘tena jitaṁ jayati’’ccādisuttekadesavacanamatthabyatti tathā vutte hotīti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:47_7: tena jitamiccādo jayanādikā kiriyāne kadabbasamavāyittena pasiddhāti yutto tattha paccekābhisambandho,
anya-e0806n4:48_4: ‘Yathāvuttajānanassa ajjhena visayatte hetumāha- ‘taṁ jānātīti tasaddena adhīyamānaparāmasato’ti.
anya-e0806n4:48_6: Yato ca uppannena vidhinā ajjhena ñātu abhidhānampasiddhanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n4:48_9: tathā ca vuttaṁ subodhālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṁ pakkantavisayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo ca taṁsaddo yaṁ saddaṁ nā pekkhate’ti,
anya-e0806n4:48_10: tasmā pasiddhivisayena tasaddena puthageva pasiddhiyā upasaṅgahatthaṁ dvitaggahaṇaṁ kattabba’’nti.
anya-e0806n4:48_11: Atthattaye vattamānassa tu tasaddassa savisayo viseso tatovātthikehi veditabbo.
anya-e0806n4:58_0: Paccayantanāmeti paccayantanāmaṁ yassa sattamyatthabhūtassa desassa hasminti attho,
anya-e0806n4:58_1: nāññasseti bhūmādivisiṭṭhatthayuttato aññassa paccayantanāmaṁ na hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:58_2: Badarā babbajā asmiṁ dese santīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:64_0: Majjhe bhavo majjhimo, ante bhavo antimo iccādi.
anya-e0806n4:66_0: Magadhesu araññe gaṅgāyaṁ pabbate vane kule bārāṇasiyaṁ campāyaṁ mithilāyaṁ sambhavoti viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:66_2: Paccayantaradassane sati imināva suttena ito aññatrāpi paccayantarāni hontīti seso,
anya-e0806n4:66_3: gāme bhavo udare bhavo pañcālesu bhavo bodhipakkhe bhavoti viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:70_8: iminā vīṇādisaddā dabbatthavuttino vādanādikiriyaṁ kiriyā visesañca sippamupacārena vadantīti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n4:71_2: kathaṁ vīṇādisaddehi dabbavuttīti vādanā vuccatīti āha- ‘vīṇādi visayattā’ti,
anya-e0806n4:71_6: Kiriyātyāsapubbakaṁ ñāṇakkhamaṁ kosallaṁ vādanakiriyā visayattā vīṇāvādanamiccanena kiriyāsaddena vuccatītyattho.
anya-e0806n4:72_3: Phalanirapekkhanti iminā idha loke cīvarādihetu paṇidhāya paṁsukūla dhāraṇādiṁ paṭikkhipati,
anya-e0806n4:72_7: Ticīvaraṁ sīlamassāti viggaho tesaṁ guḷo paṇyamassāti viggaho tomaraṁ,
anya-e0806n4:72_10: Kāmakkhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārā vā upadhi upadadhāti sukhaṁ dukkhaṁvāti katvā.
anya-e0806n4:74_1: sutte vuttāya ekasaṅkhyāya vuttamānakā lasseva ca vattumanicchitattāti attho.
anya-e0806n4:75_1: Taṁ nānantarīya kattāti upalakkhaṇavasena tesaṁ vacanakālantarānamavinābhāvittāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:75_2: Hanticcādityādyantassa kiriyāppadhānatte kathaṁ ṇādīnaṁ tadatthe jāyamānānaṁ sādhanappadhānatta miccatra hetumāha ‘sabhāvato’ti.
anya-e0806n4:75_5: diṭṭhova sandiṭṭhanti iminā saṁsaddassa visuṁ atthabhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:75_7: phaladhammopi heṭṭhimo sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṁ paccayabhāvena uparimaggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato pariyāyato dissamānova vaṭṭabhayaṁ nivatteti,
anya-e0806n4:76_1: Vidhāna vacananti appatte-tthe niyogasaṅkhātavidhino pakāsataṁ ehipassa vacanaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:76_3: Amanuññampi kadāci sappayojanaṁ yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṁ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:76_11: Athavā ehi āgaccha imaṁ dhammaṁ passāti yo appatte-tthe niyogasaṅkhāto vidhi,
anya-e0806n4:78_2: ukkaṁsenāti ukkaṁsādhānena utkaṁsasādhanena (potthake) ca bhavitabbanti sambandho .
anya-e0806n4:78_5: tattha paccayamudāharaṇena dassetvā vijjāya saha saṁsaggassāvijjamānatte kāraṇaṁ vadati ‘rūpī dhammattā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:79_5: devadattikoti hi vutte devadattena kītotyayamattho nappatīyate…
anya-e0806n4:79_7: avagamo ca nāma sati sāmatthiye siyāti imamatthaṁ saṅkhepato dassetumāha- ‘tadatthāppatītiyā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:80_0: Abhidhānalakkhaṇattanti abhidhānaṁ sati sāmatthiye vākye vacanīyassātthassa vuttiyā kathanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo yesante abhidhānalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0806n4:84_0: Pavuttepīti kaccāyanena pavuttanti atthe ‘‘aññasmiṁ’’tismiṁṇo hotevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:88_0: Mātāpitunnaṁ mātāpitaroti mātuyā mātāpitaro pitussa mātāpitaro,
anya-e0806n4:88_1: na ekamekato dvīsūti ekato ekato vuttanayena dvīsudvīsu atthesu na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:92_0: Sena rūpena ñātepi visesarūpena aññāto aññātaviseso.
anya-e0806n4:92_2: Sambandho sassāmīlakkhaṇo assa atthīti sambandhi kassāti kiṁ saddaniddiṭṭho,
anya-e0806n4:92_5: Payogāsambhavāti ayamassoti vutta assappakatiyāpi payogā sambhavā.
anya-e0806n4:92_6: Tathāhi yadi yassāccantamajānanaṁ siyā tathā sati sabbathā vatthujānanābhāve pakatiyeva na siyā,
anya-e0806n4:92_7: na hi sabbathā aviññātattho saddo payogamaharati,
anya-e0806n4:92_8: tasmā sarūpena ñātassa yassa viseso aviññāto,
anya-e0806n4:92_10: aññāto-ssokassa aññāto sesaññassa (potthake) vā kutotivā kiṁ sabhāvo veti hi assakoti.
anya-e0806n4:92_11: Kappaccayanto hatthikaiccayannāmadheyyaṁ nāmaṁ yassa hatthiviyāti dassitapaṭibhāgassa so kappaccayantanāmadheyyo.
anya-e0806n4:92_12: Abhinivesena vā sijjhanti yathā ajjunādivesadhārini ajjunādisaddenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:93_0: Paṭimāyāti ettha pūjanatthā eva paṭimā gahitā,
anya-e0806n4:93_3: idha pana taṁ sadiso puriso manusso cañcā.
anya-e0806n4:93_7: tasmiṁ ākasmikebhidheyyo sati ivasaddatthe vattamānato īyo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:95_4: Nanu pañcakaṁ ganthajātanti vatvā aññaṁ vā saṅghādikanti vuttaṁ taṁ kathaṁ pāṇiniyehi viya ‘‘saṅkhyāya
anya-e0806n4:95_6: ‘‘Ādasahi saṅkhyeye vattantī’’ti pañcasaddassa saṅkhyeye vuttattā āha- ‘pañcāvayavā’ti.
anya-e0806n4:95_9: rūpānīti ca pariyāyantarena āvuttisaddasse vātthaṁ byattaṁ karoti.
anya-e0806n4:97_0: Nanu sutte saṅkhyāyanti na vuttaṁ katyādayo ca payogā saṅkhyā parimāṇeyeva dissanti kathaṁ nāmetthāyaṁ vidhīti āha- ‘bahule’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:97_1: Saṅkhyāparimāṇeyevāyaṁ vidhīti kiṁ sadde saṅkhyāparimāṇa visayeyeva vattamāne ayaṁ ratyādiko vidhīti attho,
anya-e0806n4:97_2: nanu cettha kiṁ saddo pañhe vattamāno kathaṁ saṅkhyāparimāṇe vattateti vuccate,
anya-e0806n4:97_4: tathāpi saṅkhyāparimāṇassa pucchiyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisaye vattate vāti.
anya-e0806n4:97_7: Ayametthādhippāyo ‘‘yadākimidaṁ saṅkhyā parimāṇamesaṁ dasannaṁ na kiñci appakamevetanti saṅkhyāparimāṇameva kiṁ saddena nindīyate,
anya-e0806n4:97_8: tadāpi saṅkhyā parimāṇassa nindīyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisayattameveti khepe vattamānāpi kiṁ saddā raticcādi siyā,
anya-e0806n4:99_0: Bubhukkhāpipāsappakatīhi khasantāhi akammavacanicchāyaṁ ‘‘gamanatthā kammakādhāre cā’’ti (5-59) kattari
anya-e0806n4:99_1: kte ñimhi ca bubhukkhito pipāsitoti siddhepi vattamāne payogatthaṁ bubhukkhāpipāsāti pāṭho.
anya-e0806n4:104_1: Paṭikkhitte tasmiṁ vidatthimattaṁ ratanamattaṁ vātiādi(nā) yaṁkiñci daṇḍapubbaṇṇādikaṁ paṇṇādikaṁ (potthake) saṁsayitaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:104_2: tena mānasaṅkhātassa paricchedassābhāvā kathamete payogā siyunti āsaṅkiya tattha kāraṇamāha- ‘tathābhyūhanato siddhattā’ti.
anya-e0806n4:104_3: Tathābhyūhanatoti vidatthimānampamāṇamassa ratanammāna massātyādinā tenappakārena abhyūhanato abhyupagamatoti attho.
anya-e0806n4:104_4: Saṁsayo ca nāma ubhayapakkhaparāmasane sati siyāti yathāvuttamabbhūhanaṁ sādhetumāha-nāntarene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:104_5: Pakkhadvayehīti vidatthi mānamassa ratanammānamassāti evamādikehi pakkhadvayehi.
anya-e0806n4:110_0: Saccutīsāsadasantāya saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asmiṁ satasahasse adhikā saṅkhyāti atthe ḍo bhavatīti suttattho.
anya-e0806n4:110_2: Nanu ca sutte ‘satasahassa satasahasse ḍo’ti na vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:110_3: tathā sati vuttiyaṁ kathaṁ ‘sataṁ sahassaṁ satasahassaṁ vā’ti vuttantyāsaṅkiyāha-ubhayathāvagamā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:110_4: Ubhayathāvagamāti sataṁ sahassanti ca satasahassanti ca ubhayappakārenāvagamā,
anya-e0806n4:110_5: ubhayathāvagamo payoga dassanañcettha evaṁ vivaraṇe kāraṇanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:110_6: Paccayatthena samānajātiye pakatyatthe satīti yenakenaci suvaṇṇakahāpaṇādinā paccayatthena samānajātiye.
anya-e0806n4:112_0: Nanu ca saṅkhyāsaddo saṅkhyāne saṅkhyeyye ca vattate,
anya-e0806n4:112_1: kathamettha saṅkhyānevasitā vutti yenevaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katamiccāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n4:112_4: Yatoti vuttayaṁ saddasambandhinā taṁsaddena seti ulliṅgitassa saṅkhyātiatthamupadassiya sāyeva pūrīyatetīmassa
anya-e0806n4:112_5: kammabhāvena tiṭṭhatīti dassetuṁ tena pūraṇena pūrīyate’ti āha.
anya-e0806n4:113_1: Anenetaṁ dasseti ‘‘(na) ghaṭikādīnamiva dabbānaṁ dabbantare nātirittīkaraṇaṁ saṅkhyāya pūraṇaṁ kiñcarahi tassa samappattiyevā’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:113_3: yāvatā sāti yasmā paccayo vihito tassa saṅkhyāsaddassa parāmāso tassa ca pūraṇena abhedoccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n4:113_5: saṅkhyeyyapūraṇe ḍo na hotīti vatvā tadatthaṁ vibhāvetumāha- ‘dvādasanna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n4:113_6: So ghaṭo tāsaṁ ghaṭikānaṁ pūraṇo dabbānaṁ dabbantare nāti rittīkaraṇavasena.
anya-e0806n4:115_0: Kaccāyanena ‘‘dvitīhi tiyo’’ti (2-8-42) suttena dvitisaddehi tiyappaccayaṁ vidhāya ‘‘tiye dutāpi cā’’ti
anya-e0806n4:115_1: (2-8-43) dvitīnaṁ dutādesena dutiyaṁ tatiyanti ca ‘‘catuchehi thaṭhā’’ti (2-8-41) suttena catuto thappaccayaṁ
anya-e0806n4:115_3: Idha tathā bhāvena kathaṁ te sijjhantīti āsaṅkiya vuttiyaṁ ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti dassetumāha ‘saṅkhye’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:115_4: Vuttiyaṁ ‘dutiyassā’tiādinā suttekadesā dassitāti tāni sampuṇṇaṁ katvā dassetuṁ ‘dutiyassā’tiādinā ‘catutthatatiyāna’miccādinā ca vuttāni.
anya-e0806n4:117_1: Bahuttavisaye payogo na siyāti saṅkhyāvacanassa ekatthe niyatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:119_0: Taro hotīti vuttepi tehi taro hotīti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n4:119_1: vacchādīhīti sutattā pana vacchādīnanti ca viññāyatīti vacchādīnantiādinā vuttiganthopadassanaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:119_5: tasmā kathamatra sabhāvasseva tanuttaṁ viññāyate yenevaṁ vivaṭamiccāha- ‘vacchādisaddāna’ micca-di,
anya-e0806n4:119_6: vacchādīhi pakatīti paccaye vidhīyamāne tāsaṁ pavattinimittaṁ vayovisesādi,
anya-e0806n4:119_9: na ca kisattassa bhāvā dabbe vacchādisaddā pavattante.
anya-e0806n4:119_10: Ato tasseva saddappavattinimittassa tanutte yuttaṁ paccayena bhavituṁ,
anya-e0806n4:120_2: Dutiyañhi vayaṁ pappontassa vacchassa paṭhamo vayo vacchasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ kiñcimattāvasesaṁ bhavati amumevāha-‘susuttasse’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:120_5: Tatiyañhi vayappattakāle dutiyassa vayassa ukkhasaddappavatti nimittassa kiñcimattā vasesato vasissate
anya-e0806n4:120_9: yadātu tassa bhāravāhakatte sāmatthiyaṁ mandaṁ bhavati parikkhīṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:122_0: Samudāyo nāma dvyavayavo vā siyā bahukāvayavo vā,
anya-e0806n4:122_1: tattha dvyavayavasamudāyā niddhāraṇe sāmatthiyā ekasseva niddhāraṇaṁ viññāyati tamevānusarati.
anya-e0806n4:122_2: Bahukāvayavasamudāyāpye ‘kassa niddhāraṇe’ti sutte ekassāti vacanābhāvepi ekasseva niddhāraṇaṁ viññātabbaṁ
anya-e0806n4:122_4: Kataro bhavataṁ devadatto kataro bhavataṁ kaṭhotyādyudāharaṇabahuttena niddhāraṇavācīnamabahutthepi niddhāriyamānavācīhī’ti bahuttena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:122_8: caraṇasaddā ca kaṭhā yo kiriyāsaddā bhavanti kaṭhādīhi vuttajjhayanatthaṁ yathā sakaṁvatacaraṇakiriyānimittattenājjhetūsu
anya-e0806n4:122_9: pavattāti tesaṁ sambandhisaddānaṁ kesañci atthassa kiriyāsaddānaṁ cātthassa asatyapi jātitte jātinibandhanaṁ
anya-e0806n4:122_10: loke kāriyamiṭṭhaṁ taduttaṁ ‘‘gottañca cara- ṇehi sahā’’ti.
anya-e0806n4:122_12: tenāha- ‘kaṭhassa caraṇattā jātittaṁ gotattā jātitta’nti ca.
anya-e0806n4:124_4: Devehi datto brahmunā dattotiādīni kattari karaṇe vā viggahavākyāni.
anya-e0806n4:125_1: devalo deviyotiādīnampana vacanantareneva nipphattiṁ dassetuṁ ‘devehi datto’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:125_2: Parasaddasatthakārānampi devalo deviyoti vacanantareneva sādhanaṁ sādhanākārañca tesaṁ dassetuṁ ‘kecīhī’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:125_3: Ekadesatoyeva paccayamicchanti tena tesaṁ devalo deviyo datti loccādi bhavati.
anya-e0806n4:127_0: Na ca sabbetiādinā bahulādhikāre phalaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:127_1: Bhāvasaddo katthaci kiriyāyaṁ vattate ‘bhāve ayaṁ vidhī’ti.
anya-e0806n4:127_10: sāva patīyate-nenāttho pacceti attha miti vā paccayoti vuccati.
anya-e0806n4:128_0: Nanu ca ‘bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddā’ti vuttaṁ tasmā pavattinimittamubhinnampi bhavati,
anya-e0806n4:128_1: tathāsati ‘saddappavattinimitta’nti saddasseva pavattinimittatā kasmā vuttāti vuccate.
anya-e0806n4:128_2: Pākaṭabhāvena abhidhānābhidheyyasambandhassa saddasseva pavattinimittataṁ vatvā visuṁ buddhiyā nimittassa
anya-e0806n4:128_4: Dabbeguṇoti dabbe vuttiyaṁ guṇo nimittanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:128_6: guṇassa jātiyā visuṁ jātinimittassābhāvato nidhittassa bhāvato.
anya-e0806n4:128_9: Tesaṁ devadattādīnaṁ avatthāvisesena avatthābhedena sāmaññaṁ tadavatthā visesasāmaññaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:128_11: Vijjamāno padattho visayo yesaṁ devadattādīnaṁ saññāsaddānaṁ tesaṁ pavattinimittaṁ jātilakkhaṇamācikkhitampaṭipāditanti attho.
anya-e0806n4:129_0: Anena ca devadattādayo saññāsaddāpi samānā jātisaddāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n4:130_1: Abhāvassabhedatoti ghaṭapaṭādīnaṁ sambandhīnaṁ bhedena abhāvassa bhedato abhedepi bhedā upacaritā santīti yojanā.
anya-e0806n4:130_4: Niravayavāvijjamānavisayānantiye ākāso viya niravayavā abhāvo viya asantā ca,
anya-e0806n4:130_5: te visayo yesaṁ saddānaṁ tesanti attho.
anya-e0806n4:130_8: brahmaññaṁ jāti cāpalyaṁ nepuññaṁ guṇo vā.
anya-e0806n4:130_9: Vuttiyaṁ sakatthekantāti ‘‘sakatthe’’ti (4-122) iminā sakatthe katakappaccayantāti attho.
anya-e0806n4:134_2: So ca atisayo kassa sambhavaticcāha- ‘so ca kiriyāguṇāna’nti.
anya-e0806n4:134_5: Anapekkhito kiriyāguṇānaṁ nissayo dabbasaṅkhāto yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n4:134_6: dabbassa nissayabhūtassā-tisayattaṁ hontampi nissitānaṁ kiriyā guṇānaṁ vaseneva siyā nāññathāti vattumāha-‘paccadhikaraṇa’ntiādi.
anya-e0806n4:135_3: kassa carahi guṇassa go ayaṁ yo sakaṭaṁ vahati,
anya-e0806n4:135_5: jātiyā hi niccāyekarūpāya nokkaṁsāpakaṁsayogo sambhavatīti dabbassāpi nātisayasambhavo.
anya-e0806n4:135_6: Tathāhi tulyappamāṇassa guṇakatova mūlato ukkaṁso dissati samānepi hi āyāme vitthāre ca paṭassa kāsikassāññovāggho bhavati māthurassāñño vāti.
anya-e0806n4:135_8: Yadaggena kiriyāguṇānaṁ nissitānamatisayavasena nissayabhūtampi dabbaṁ kathañcidapyatisaye vattati nāma,
anya-e0806n4:135_9: tadagge tabbācikāpi pakati attano vacanīyatthavasena tattha vattatiyeva nāmāti ‘atiyaye vattamānato’ti pakativisesanavasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:136_6: tato pakatyatthabhūte-tisaye jātattā sakatthikehi yathāvuttanayena pakatyatthabhūtetisayo jotanīyo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n4:137_1: Ukkaṁso samānaguṇavisayeyeva loke diṭṭho paviṭṭho (potthake) tena sāmaññavacanepi tādithavisayeyeva soyeva
anya-e0806n4:138_1: tarappaccayo na hotīti eko māthuro dutiyo pāṭaliputtako imesaṁ sukumārānaṁ dvinnameko māthuro-tisayena
anya-e0806n4:138_3: ekamaññesaṁ dvinnamukkaṁsetathāññesaṁ dvinnamekassāti evaṁ dvinnaṁdvinnamekekassa ukkaṁse tarappaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n4:138_5: tathāhi sukumārattenukkaṁsiyamānānaṁ samudāyānamavayavā māthurā bahavo pāṭaliputtakāpi nikkaṁsiyamānā tathevāvayavā bahavo honti,
anya-e0806n4:138_6: evaṁ māthurā pāṭali puttakehi sukumāratarā’ti tarappaccayena sijjhati.
anya-e0806n4:138_7: Imasmiṁ gāme aḍḍhatarā vāṇijjāccādopi kathitena ñāyena dvinnaṁdvinnamekekassa ukkaṁse tarappaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n4:138_8: bahuvacanantu katthaci avayavāpekkhanti sabbaṁ sakkate kicchena sādhenti.
anya-e0806n4:138_9: Iha tu tathāvidhassa suttassā vidhānā ‘‘taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye’’ti tarādīnamatisaye sāmaññena vidhānā
anya-e0806n4:139_4: Pañcasvetesūti etesaṁ yathāvuttānaṁ tarādīnaṁ pañcannaṁ majjhe,
anya-e0806n4:139_7: Issika iyaiṭṭhā sarādī tato (aññato) na honti bahulādhikārā.
anya-e0806n4:141_0: Tassāti sāmaññena vuttepi vikārasambandhīyeva chaṭṭhiyanto gayhati,
anya-e0806n4:141_1: chaṭṭhiyantasambandhīyeva ca vikāro gayhati sambandhavasāti dassetumāha ‘yassā’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:141_5: rukkhā pupphaphalūpagāti rukkhosadhīnaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ vadanti tallakkhaṇenettha rukkho sadhayo na gayhanti,
anya-e0806n4:145_1: Rājaññamanussānampi jātiyamapacce ññassappaccayānaṁ vidhānā vuttaṁ ‘gottappaccayantā’ti āha- ‘rājaññānaṁ samūho’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:145_8: ṇikaacittāti iminā ṇiko acittavāca keheva dissatīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0806n4:147_0: ‘‘Tadassaṭṭhānamīyo cā’’ti (2-8-13) kaccāyanasuttassāya mattho ‘‘tadassaṭṭhānamiccetasmiṁ atthe chaṭṭhiyantato īyappaccayo hotī’ti.
anya-e0806n4:147_1: Tena madanassa ṭhānaṁ madanīyaṁ bandhanassa ṭhānaṁ bandhanīyaṁtyādikaṁ sādhenti.
anya-e0806n4:147_2: Idha pana tathāvidhassābhāvā kathaṁ taṁ sijjhatītyāsaṅkiya ‘madanīya’ntiādikaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:148_2: dhūmo viya dissatīti dhūmāyitattaṁ timiramiva dissatīti timirāyitattaṁtyādikaṁ sādhentīti vuttanayameva.
anya-e0806n4:148_4: dhūmo viya dissatīti dassito yo kammattho sopi dhūmāyīti kattuvasena sakkā parikappetunti kattusādhanato
anya-e0806n4:148_5: dhūmāyitasaddā sakatthettappaccayepi dhūmo viya dissatīti atthe āyitatthappaccayepi nātthabhedo-ññatravacanicchābhedāti
anya-e0806n4:152_0: Pavāse dūragamane sādhu pavāsiko, upavāse ratyabhojane sādhu upavāsiko.
anya-e0806n4:154_2: sapatimhi dhana patimhi sādhu upakaraṇaṁ sāpateyyaṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:158_0: Itisaddena byavacchinnamatthamupadassayamaññanāpekkhaṁ sappadhānaṁ mantvādi vidhimhidamatthadvayaṁ byāpārīyaticcāha-‘ettha assa atthī’ti.
anya-e0806n4:158_1: Nanu ca yaṁ yassa hoti taṁ tasmimpi hoti (yaṁ yasmiṁ hoti) tassāpi taṁ hoti teneva vuccate- ‘chaṭṭhīsattamīnamaviseso’ti,
anya-e0806n4:158_2: tatrañña taraniddeseneva siddhe kimatthamiha chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ bhedenopādānaṁ karīyatīti vuccate-yatrāvayavāvayavibhāvo,
anya-e0806n4:158_3: tattheva chaṭṭhīsattamīnamatthassa aviseso vatthuto (potthake) yathā ‘rukkhesākhā rukkhassa sākhā’ti.
anya-e0806n4:159_0: Nanu ca sambhave byabhicāre ca sati visesanaṁ sātthakaṁ bhavati yathā ‘nīlamuppala’nti,
anya-e0806n4:159_2: tathā ca vuttaṁ- ‘na sattaṁ padattho byabhicaratī’ti,
anya-e0806n4:160_0: Nanu ca suttesu kālo padhānaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0806n4:160_2: tathā hi kāyikaṁvācasikaṁ tyādo na kālasampaccayo,
anya-e0806n4:160_4: atthīti tu vattamānasattāya eva pariggaho kathamavasīyate yena kālavisesanaṁ siyāti. Saccaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:160_5: kintu padatthassa sattābyabhicārābhāvepi atthītivisesanopādānasāmatthiyātra visiṭṭho sattā atthīti visesanattenopāttā,
anya-e0806n4:160_8: atthi ca tassā byabhicāro sāmaññasattāyāti yujjateva visesanavisessabhāvoti maññate.
anya-e0806n4:161_0: Na bhuñjaticcādiviyāti yathā na bhuñjatīti nañssa paṭisedhattā viruddhatthapadassa sannidhāne-tthantarassa
anya-e0806n4:161_3: Adhippāyattha māha- ‘atthivacanicchāya yo visayo tassa niyamo’ti.
anya-e0806n4:161_4: Kati payasambhave na pana gomā rukkhavāti yojanā,
anya-e0806n4:161_9: Saṁsatto daṇḍo assa atthiccanena gehaṭṭhitena vijjamānenapi daṇḍena daṇḍīti nābhidhīyatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n4:161_11: bhavaṁ bhaveyyāti yadākadāci bhavanto yadi bhaveyya.
anya-e0806n4:165_0: Dve hontīti iko īceti dve honti,
anya-e0806n4:165_14: asannihitopādhikā atthantā ca ika īppaccayo bhavatītyattho.
anya-e0806n4:166_6: Tīsu vaṇṇesu bhavo tadantogadhattā tevaṇṇikoti bhavatthe ṇiko.
anya-e0806n4:167_1: taṁ brahmaṁ nibbānaṁ dhammaṁ vā tepiṭakaṁ caratīti brahmacārī, yati.
anya-e0806n4:167_7: Padumagaccha pokkharaṇīnaṁ vācakassāti iminā padumāni assaṁ santīti paduminīti pokkharaṇīpi vuccatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:169_0: Ihāpi pasajjeyya madhu asmiṁ ghaṭe atthīti etthāpi payoge madhuranti rappaccayo pāpuṇeyya madhumhi abhidheyyati adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n4:169_3: tathāpi ñusādivato paccaya(ttha)ttena vacanicchābhāvā ñusavā ghaṭoccādi na sijjhati tasmā pahūtādivisayātthitāsambhavepi
anya-e0806n4:169_4: taṁvato-tthassa paccaya(ttha)ttena ñusaro desoti vattu micchāyaṁ paccayo yathā siyā aññatramābhaviccevamattho
anya-e0806n4:171_0: Parehi vācāsaddā ālo vihito nindāyaṁ, neha tatheti codanamubbhāvayati ‘nindāya’miccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:177_0: Akārādeso ca ṇasanniyogenāti iminā yattha ṇakāro tatthevāyamakārādesoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:177_1: Upādānatoti iminā nissayakaraṇameko satthiyo ñāyoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:177_2: Antassa avidhānasāmatthiyācāti iminā satipi pubbalopena payoga nipphattiyaṁ akāraṁ vidhāya tassa lopo niratthakoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n4:179_0: Kappo yogyatā assa atthīti kappiyo, jaṭā hānabhāgo, senā assa atthīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:181_0: ‘Ohāka cāge’ iti sakakārassa hādhātuno payoge toppaccayaṁ nisedhetvā‘satthā hīyate satthā hīno’ti udāharaṇaṁ dassitaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:181_3: Cīppaccayāvasānānanti ‘‘abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārācī’’ti (4-119) vutto cīppaccayo avasāne ye santi viggaho.
anya-e0806n4:181_5: Kaccāyane tu toādīnaṁ vibhatti saññattā na tato puna vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0806n4:183_0: Vuttiyaṁ ‘etassa ṭa eta’ iti atoiccatra etassa ṭādeso etto iccatra etaādesoti attho.
anya-e0806n4:185_4: apañcamyantā pana ‘‘ādyādīhī’’ti sutte sasaṅkhyassādisaddassa gahaṇena taṁsadisā sasaṅkhyāevopalakkhīyantītipi
anya-e0806n4:185_5: viññāyeyya tato apañcamyantehi abhyādīhi to na siyāti abhitoccādi na sijjhatīti ‘‘abhyādīhī’’ti suttanti
anya-e0806n4:187_0: Nanu ca toicceva sāmaññena suttite yatokutoci pañcamyantā vā apañcamyantā vā bahulaṁ vā tomhi iṭṭhappasiddhīti kiṁ ādyādīhīti suttenāti saccaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:187_1: tathāpi vibhāgena dassite vibhāgaso visesāvasāyo siyāti na dosoti.
anya-e0806n4:189_0: Pubbenevāti ‘‘sabbādito’’ (4-99) ccādināva. Etassāti etasaddassa, imassāti imasaddassa.
anya-e0806n4:193_0: Yatrāti vutte yatthāti uppalakkhitameva siyāti na vuttaṁ. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0806n4:195_0: Hiñcanaṁ vidhīyate ‘‘hiṁ haṁ hiñcana’’nti (2-5-9) suttena. Hiñciādīnanti hiñcidācirahaciādīnaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:201_3: Ettha pana mammatāḷanaṁ nimittaṁ pāṇa haraṇaṁ nimittī,
anya-e0806n4:201_5: Upari tyādikaṇḍe karahasaddo tu cisaddasaṁyuttova dissati karahacīti.
anya-e0806n4:203_2: tattha yadi sopi gayheyya dabba guṇānaṁ liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogā dhāppaccayanta(mpi tabbisayoyeveti) cettha
anya-e0806n4:203_7: kiriyāvisaye tu tasmiṁ gayhamāne ekadhābhuñjati dvidhābhuñjati dvidhāgacchaticcādo bhojana gamanādikiriyāya
anya-e0806n4:203_8: sabbathā liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogābhāvā yathāvutta doso na siyāti pāṇinīyavuttikārena jayādiccena kiriyā visayoyevettha
anya-e0806n4:204_1: Rūpa rasa gandha phassa saṅkhyāparimāṇa puthuttasaṁyogavibhāga parattāparattabuddhisukhadukkhecchādosapayatanā ca guṇā,
anya-e0806n4:204_2: casaddena gurutta davattasinehasaṅkhāradhammādhammasaddā ceti catubbīsati bahudhā guṇo.
anya-e0806n4:204_3: Atrāpi yathāvuttakāsikāvuttiyā pañcikākārena jinindabuddhinā navadhā dabbaṁ bahudhā guṇotyatrāpi ‘‘kiriyājjhāharitabbā
anya-e0806n4:204_4: navadhā dabbaṁ bahudhā guṇo upadisīyati viññāyati byākhyāyate vijjatevā’’ti kiriyāvisayoyeva pakāro paṭipādito,
anya-e0806n4:204_5: payogadassanato byavacchejjabhāvā sabbattha kiriyeveti visesanopādānamayuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:205_0: Navadhā dabbaṁ bahudhā guṇoti payogadassanato dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṁ gayhupagattā byavacchedayitabbānaṁ
anya-e0806n4:205_1: dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṁ bhāvā sabbasmiṁ dabbaguṇavisaye jinindabuddhinā vuttanayena kiriyā atthevāti
anya-e0806n4:205_2: kiriyāvisayova pakāro gayhatīti vuttikāra pañjikākārānaṁ visesanopādānamayuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n4:206_0: Tatoyevāti yato visesanopādānamayuttaṁ tatoyeva dvīhiccādikamāheti attho.
anya-e0806n4:206_5: Tatoyeva kiriyāpakāropādāne pakārotisayane (potthake) atra dhāppaccayantappayogo na siyāti viññāpetuṁ ‘dvīhi’ccādikamāhe’’ti tenāha‘atre’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:207_0: Dabbaguṇavisaye pakāre gayhamāne yoyaṁ doso sambhāvito parehi,
anya-e0806n4:207_4: tadāha- ‘dabbasse’ccādi saṅkhyāntarāpādanepīti pubbaṁ yā vavatthitā saṅkhyā,
anya-e0806n4:207_5: tato- ññaṁ saṅkhyāntaraṁ tassāpādanaṁ karaṇaṁ saṅkhyantarāpādanaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:209_1: tasaddena pakārassa parāmaṭṭhattā tabbatītettha pakāravatīti attho vuttoti āha- ‘tasaddene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n4:211_0: Kiṁ saṅkhyānamparimāṇamesanti atthe ‘‘kimhā rati rīvarīvataka rittakā’’ti (4-44) suttena ratippaccayaṁ
anya-e0806n4:211_2: kati ca so saṅkhyā parimāṇavisayattā saṅkhyā ceti katisaṅkhyā, tāya.
anya-e0806n4:213_0: Paccāsattīti sambandhimhi ekamhi dassite dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa paro sambandhī viññāyamāno parova viññāyati yuttitoti ‘sambandhatovā’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:217_0: Khaṇḍaṁ khaṇḍaṁ khaṇḍaso, puthu pakāro puthuso.
anya-e0806n4:219_0: Nanu ca abhavanannāma sabbathā anuppattiyā vā avatthantarena vā,
anya-e0806n4:219_2: Kathamavatthāva tasaddena parāmasīyatīti ce abhūtasaddo yadyanuppannavācī siyā,
anya-e0806n4:219_9: Bhavanaṁ bhāvo tāya avatthantare bhāvo tabbhāvo tasmiṁ.
anya-e0806n4:221_0: Dissantīti vutte payoge dissantīti ayamattho viññāyatīti āha ‘disi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n4:221_1: idaṁ suttaṁ vijjhaṅga paribhāsā bhavatīti seso.
anya-e0806n4:221_2: ‘‘Ṇovā-pacce’’tiādinā (4-1) suttena vuttesvanekavidhesu atthesu pari samantato bhāsatīti paribhāsā,
anya-e0806n4:223_1: na vijjatentaramesanti antarāḷamattapaṭisedhepayojanaṁ natthīti katvāntarā ḷaṭṭhassābhāvāntarāḷaṁ natthītyupacarīyati,
anya-e0806n4:223_2: evañhi loke payujjate ‘anantarā ime gāmā anantarā ime pāsādā’ti antarāḷagatassa ññassa gāmassaññassa pāsādassa vābhāvā tathā byapadisīyate,
anya-e0806n4:223_5: Antaraṁ karotīti vā khādiippaccayaṁ ṇippaccayaṁ (potthake) vidhāya antarāyati byavadhānaṁ karotīti kattari
anya-e0806n4:223_6: appaccayaṁ vidhāya antaro byavadhāyako natthetesanti anantarā.
anya-e0806n4:224_1: tasmā byañjanāti bahuvacanena saṁyogoti ekavacananiddeso ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n4:224_2: nanu ca vaṇṇānamuccāritappadhaṁsittā yogapajjamaṭṭhitamānānaṁ na sambhavati samudāyattanti samudāyattamayuttanti nāyuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n4:224_3: tathāhi uttaruttaraggāhini buddhi pubbaparībhūte byañjanāvayave samudāyarūpena saṅkappentī samudāyavohārampavattayīti.
anya-e0806n4:225_1: uḷumpasaddassa saṁyogavisayattā oḷumpikoti etassa visayoti tattha rāghavo venateyyo meniko decco dosaggānti rūpāni.
anya-e0806n4:227_0: Kosajjanti ettha tassa jattañca nipātanā, ajjavanti etthha ‘‘uvaṇṇassā vava sare’’ti (4-129).
anya-e0806n4:233_0: Satissāti vutte satisaddo viññāyati satyantepi visesanattena vattumicchitesatyanto kathaṁ viññāyaticcāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n4:233_2: tasmiñca ḍetinimittenopādinne tadupādānasāmatthiyāsatyantova viññāyatīti dassetumāha- ‘ḍeti nimittopādānā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n4:235_1: Pañcikāyampana pakatipi saddoyevāti dhātutoiccādinā adhātusaddassa atthamattaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n4:236_4: Pubbaggahaṇamantarenātipāṇininā ikārādesavidhāyake imasmiṁyeva suttekakārato pubbassa ikārādesavidhānatthaṁ pubbaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0806n4:236_9: siyā etanti bahuparibbājakāti etaṁ rūpaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n4:237_0: Nanu ca asyāditoti ettha pasajjappaṭisedho naña kasmā gahito,
anya-e0806n4:237_1: na pariyudosoti āsaṅkiya pariyudāsesmiṁ gahite sati dosaṁ vattumārabhate ‘pariyudāse’iccādinā.
anya-e0806n4:237_5: Asyādismā paroti katvā bahuparibbājakasaddato na syādyuppattīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n4:238_1: Pasajjappaṭisedhena nañasaddena aññapadatthasamāsepi siyāva dosoti dassento āha- ‘avijjamānosyādi’ccādi.
